mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.web_site, c.reply_user_id, r.nickname as reply_nickname, r.web_site as reply_web_site, c.id, c.parent_id, c.comment_content, c.create_time FROM tb_comment c JOIN tb_user_info u ON c.user_id = u.id JOIN tb_user_info r ON c.reply_user_id = r.id WHERE c.is_review = 1 AND parent_id =#{commentId} ORDER BY c.id ASC LIMIT #{current}, #{size}
